attributes.action: ,We would like a questionaire sent around to all members of the public,so they can tell the gvernment what powers we would like back from Europe
attributes.additional_details:
As we have just been given a cast iron garantee of a vote on any talks to repatriate powers from Europe.
I.E
1. Immigration
2. justice
3.Social welfare including working hours
4.A veto without question on the creeping legislation that is destroying our business
5.Our fishing  grounds back.

This is only a small sample of what could be asked but this would be fairer than any other syste the government might introduce
